## Problem I

Suppose you are given the positive numbers $p, q, r$ and $s$. Prove that
\[
\frac{(p^2 + 1))(q^2 + 1)(r^2 + 1)(s^2 + 1)}{pqrs} \ge 16
\]

## Problem II

Suppose you are given the positive numbers $x, y$ and $z$. Prove that
\[
\frac{(x^2 + x + 1)(y^2 + y + 1)(z^2 + z + 1)}{pqrs} \ge 27
\]
